#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[1001];

int main(void)
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t,n,threshold,note;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        note=0;
        cin>>n>>threshold;
        for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
        {
            cin>>arr[i];
            if(arr[i]>=threshold)
            ++note;
        }
        cout<<note<<'\n';
    }
}
